name: Bus 496
description:
In "Bus 496", the player will follow a moment of life of three different characters, each discriminated differently within the same bus.

Each situation evoked will be represented by a mini game.

Created by:
  • Damien COMBE - Sound Designer / Programmer 
  • Hugo VEILLE - Game Designer
  • Valérian CHORGNON - Game artist / UI Designer
  • Céline FERHAT - Game artist
